segments.en: “Mendicants, develop limitless immersion, alert and mindful.

segments.pli: Samādhiṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvayataṃ appamāṇaṃ nipakānaṃ patissatānaṃ pañca ñāṇāni paccattaññeva uppajjanti.
segments.en: When you develop limitless immersion, alert and mindful, five knowledges arise for you personally.

segments.pli: ‘Ayaṃ samādhi paccuppannasukho ceva āyatiñca sukhavipāko’ti paccattaññeva ñāṇaṃ uppajjati,
segments.en: ‘This immersion is blissful now, and results in bliss in the future.’ …

segments.pli: ‘ayaṃ samādhi ariyo nirāmiso’ti paccattaññeva ñāṇaṃ uppajjati,

segments.en: ‘This immersion is not cultivated by sinners.’ …

segments.pli: ‘ayaṃ samādhi santo paṇīto paṭippassaddhaladdho ekodibhāvādhigato, na sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagato’ti paccattaññeva ñāṇaṃ uppajjati,
segments.en: ‘This immersion is peaceful and sublime and tranquil and unified, not held in place by forceful suppression.’ …

segments.pli: ‘sato kho panāhaṃ imaṃ samāpajjāmi sato vuṭṭhahāmī’ti paccattaññeva ñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
segments.en: ‘I mindfully enter into and emerge from this immersion.’ …

segments.pli: Samādhiṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvetha appamāṇaṃ nipakā patissatā.
segments.en: Develop limitless immersion, alert and mindful.

segments.pli: Samādhiṃ, bhikkhave, bhāvayataṃ appamāṇaṃ nipakānaṃ patissatānaṃ imāni pañca ñāṇāni paccattaññeva uppajjantī”ti.
segments.en: When you develop limitless immersion, alert and mindful, these five knowledges arise for you personally.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, develop limitless immersion, alert and mindful.

suttaplex.blurb: Develop measureless convergence of mind and five knowledges intuitively arise.
